author: Simon Difford
description: Honey and vanilla laced with white rum and charged with champagne. Perfect for Valentine's Day.
name: Honey Bee Mine
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)
30 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
